sentence: My sister is ______ than me.
explanation: Use <taller> (comparative form of <tall>) to compare two people
tip: Complete with the comparative form of <tall>

sentence: This book is ______ than that one.
explanation: Use <better> (comparative form of <good>) - irregular comparative
tip: Complete with the comparative form of <good>
